title: Refining Social Media Share Buttons Grayscale UI Update

description.summary: In this session, we update social media share buttons to follow a clean grayscale aesthetic. The changes include setting button backgrounds to light gray, darkening icons for better contrast, ensuring a uniform monochrome look, and maintaining hover animations while removing color-specific styles. The result is a polished and professional UI that enhances site consistency.
steps: 1. Open your project in VS Code or your preferred code editor.
2. Locate the HTML file where the social media buttons are defined.
3. Identify the CSS styles controlling the button colors and icon styles.
4. Update the button background colors to a light gray (#e0e0e0) to achieve a clean grayscale look.
5. Adjust the icon colors to a darker gray (#333333) for better contrast and visibility.
6. Remove any existing color-based hover effects to maintain consistency.
7. Add a subtle hover animation by slightly darkening the background color on hover.
8. Save the changes and push the updated files to your GitHub repository.
9. Test the new design in your browser to ensure all buttons display correctly.
10. Commit and synchronize the changes to finalize the update.
